name: 王友恭
objective: Understanding the basic concepts and fundamental technique of economic evaluation in engineering projects . The technique will be applied to how to select engineering design alternatives and how to make both Engineering & Economic investment decision .
schedule:
① Introduction of engineering economics .
② Time value of money , interest and economic equivalence .
③ Cash flow and time value of money formulas .
④ developing the cash flow for alternatives .
⑤ Comparing and selecting mutually exclusive alternatives .
⑥ Effect of Inflation
⑦ Depreciation Method
⑧ After tax Analysis
⑨ Application of Engineering Economics in infrastructure investment
